se.background.description: Define background images for each area.
se.background.title: background image (reboot takes effect)
se.background.isOpened: whether to turn on image backgrounds
se.background.fullScreen.imgUrl: `Full screen` background image address, effective when full screen mode is selected in the display area
se.background.fullScreen.opacity: `Full screen` background image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.titlebar.imgUrl: `Menu bar` background image address, effective when displaying the region selection zone mode
se.background.titlebar.opacity: `Menu bar` background image image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.banner.imgUrl: `Banner` background image address, effective when the display area is selected in zone mode
se.background.banner.opacity: `Banner` background image image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.activitybar.imgUrl: `Activity bar` background image address, in effect when the display area is selected in the zone mode
se.background.activitybar.opacity: `Activity bar` background image image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.sidebar.imgUrl: `Main Sidebar` background image address, effective when the display area is selected in zone mode
se.background.sidebar.opacity: `Main Sidebar` background image image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.editor.imgUrl: `Editor` background image address, in effect when the region is selected for the region
se.background.editor.opacity: `Editor` background image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.panel.imgUrl: `Panel` background image address, effective when the display area is selected in zone mode
se.background.panel.opacity: `Panel` background image image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.auxiliarybar.imgUrl: `Secondary sidebar` background image address, effective when the display region is selected in zone mode
se.background.auxiliarybar.opacity: `Secondary sidebar` background image image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
se.background.statusbar.imgUrl: `Status bar` background image address, in effect when the display zone mode is selected
se.background.statusbar.opacity: `Status bar` background image image transparency, full transparency 0 to opaque 1, recommended 0.1
